a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Historical literacy in England, by sex
Figure illustrates the percentage of persons who are literate. Data for 1840-1860 from Schofield (1973), % of men and women who sign
marriage registers (England); 1640s-1740s from Houston (1982), % of witnesses who sign court depositions (North England); 1580-1720 from
Cressy (1980), % witnesses who sign ecclesiastical court declarations (Norwich Diocese). Figures are not nationally representative.
Data source: Cressy (1980), R.A Houston (1982), Schofield (1973)
